item.description:
The EcoTarium is a unique indoor-outdoor museum and offers a chance to walk through the treetops, take a multimedia journey through the galaxy at a digital planetarium, meet wildlife, stroll nature trails, ride a narrow-gauge railroad, and get hands-on with family- friendly exhibits. Located just off Rte. 9 as you enter Worcester, there is plenty of parking in the museum lot.

For those who have RSVP'd for the EcoTarium tomorrow, we will be getting a group discounted rate for admission - $7.00 per person. 

In order to get the discount, we have to arrive together at the parking lot gate and drive in together.

**** We will meet in our cars at 1:30 at the baseball field that is next to the Ecotarium.****

We have to make one payment for the whole group, so please plan to bring cash to pay admission.

See you tomorrow!
Jen
item.name: Kidsâ€™ Weekend Activity: EcoTarium
